s: Create aromatic smoked cocktails like a pro with Middleton Mixology's cocktail smoking kits. Perfect for restaurants, bars, hotels, or even at-home bartenders.
Goods and guidance, delivered in a monthly box of awesome – plus a full shop of uniquely cool products.
Middleton Mixology has brought you the first cocktail smoke infuser of its kind. We’re proud to offer you The SmokeTop.

Designed with simplicity in mind, SmokeTop offers anyone the chance to be a professional bartender – one smoking knockout at a time! Seen another kit elsewhere? Don’t settle for knock-offs or cheap copies – choose Middleton Mixology for quality of service you can depend on.
